trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SEQ_00<tab>Sul Uin aches for your attention.
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_TODO_00<tab>Sow everbloom seeds around Lydha Lran.
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SULUIN_000_000<tab>Ooh, ooh! Look at me, look at me! I have a task for you!

TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SULUIN_000_001<tab>Lydha Lran is our beloved village, and we want it to always look lovely. And it can't look lovely without flowers blooming. And no flowers bloom lovelier than everblooms!
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SULUIN_000_002<tab>So, here are some everbloom seeds. Take them and sow them here, there, and everywhere around the village. Simple as a dimple, yes?
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SULUIN_000_010<tab>No flowers bloom lovelier than everblooms. Take those seeds and sow them here, there, and everywhere around the village!
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_PIXIEA03307_000_020<tab>(-Curious Pixie-)Helping us grow flowers, are you? They'll make this house look so much lovelier!

TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_PIXIEA03307_000_021<tab>(-Curious Pixie-)There used to be a city of mortals here. A great big, bustling place called Voeburt or Boevurt or some such. But the sin eaters came and everyone disappeared.
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_PIXIEA03307_000_022<tab>(-Curious Pixie-)Since then, we pixies have been living here, and we've given the old houses our touch. Lovely, don't you think?
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_PIXIEB03307_000_023<tab>(-Jovial Pixie-)Ooh, I can't wait for the flowers to bloom! Perhaps I'll make pretty curtains out of them!
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SULUIN_000_030<tab>You're done sowing the seeds? Thank you! This shall help Lydha Lran live up to its name─which means “flower house,” in case you weren't aware.
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SULUIN_000_031<tab>We weren't always here, you know. We used to live deep in a lush forest. It was beautiful beyond compare, but almost all of it was swallowed up by the light.
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SULUIN_000_032<tab>For a while we roamed, but eventually we found a place that men had abandoned. Together with our fellow fae folk, we decided to make it our new home.
TEXT_LUCKMB106_03307_SULUIN_000_033<tab>The land of everlasting spring─this is our home, and it could be yours too. Forever and ever and ever...
